tool_description: Analyzes scripture passages in their original Hebrew, Aramaic, or Greek languages, providing linguistic insights for interpretation.

reference.description: Scripture reference to analyze in original language

analysis_type.description: Type of analysis: word_study, grammar, syntax, semantic, or comprehensive

include_transliteration.description: Include transliterated text for non-Latin scripts

focus_words.description: Specific words to focus analysis on

include_etymology.description: Include word etymology and historical development

grammatical_detail.description: Level of grammatical detail: basic, intermediate, or advanced

error_messages: Invalid reference: Provide a valid scripture reference in standard format.
Invalid analysis type: Use one of [word_study, grammar, syntax, semantic, comprehensive].
Original text unavailable: Original language text not available for this passage.
Invalid grammatical detail level: Use one of [basic, intermediate, advanced].
Invalid focus words: Ensure focus words exist in the passage.
usage: Provide scripture reference and analysis type. Optionally specify focus words and detail levels. Returns linguistic analysis with original text and interpretive insights.

original_text.description: Text in original Hebrew, Aramaic, or Greek

translation_implications.description: How original language affects translation and interpretation
